DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Site Name 64 Character Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The words which describe the surroundings in which a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  [Manually-curated]_LO: A 64-character string with leading or trailing spaces being non-significant; NO CONTROL characters. [Standard-based]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The words which describe the surroundings in which a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  [Manually-curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.:Position in relation to the surroundings.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
A position in relation to its surroundings.

Property.preferredDefinition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 12/10/08 - replaced retired concept C15207 with C71104.  12/9/08 - released post VCDE Interim Silver Review changes.  9/17/07 -DEC created to support DICOM CDE task utilizing IE; DICOM Attribute terms.  Needed for NCIA model load.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: LO: A 64-character string with leading or trailing spaces being non-significant; NO CONTROL characters. [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).
